messages.title: What matters to you matters to me!
messages.content: This General Election is about the big choices that face us all, our friends, our families, our communities. Labour will support people and work for recovery. The Tories would slash services and put our recovery at risk. I wouldn't trust my family's future to the Tories!

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Provide support for Northampton's hard-working families
keyPolicies.policyDescription: To protect services, jobs and family incomes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Work to get a new hospital for Northampton
keyPolicies.policyDescription: To meet the needs of our growing town.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Tackle anti-social behaviour and especially binge drinking

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Pensions and also through better care and support at home.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Create more opportunities for young people
keyPolicies.policyDescription: More jobs and more training and education places.

issues.health: Work to get a new hospital for Northampton to meet the needs of our growing town.

housing.content: Provide support to protect services, jobs, and family incomes.

leaflet.personalStatement: What matters to you matters to me!

contactInformation.address: Sally Keeble, 72a Leaf Road, Northampton NN1 4PH

quotes.text: I'm asking for your vote on May 6th. Because of all that Labour has done.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Only Labour can keep the Tories out. So vote Labour for a future fair for all.
